Label: CT 111: Accruing Interest Rate Swap starting at 01/02/2015
Description: Accruing Interest Rate Swap starting at 01/02/2015 with a Notional of USD 1000.0 which then increases gradually until it reaches USD 3000.0 at Maturity. The fixed leg is based on semi-annual payments at 1%, the floating leg is based on semi-annual payments at reference rate + 2%.
